markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graceful Leaper](/Feats.aspx?ID=6243) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 183 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=236)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6240); Master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34)

</column>

---

Mass and muscle are meaningless when you propel yourself through the air; only grace and balance matter. You can roll an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check instead of an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check when making a [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378).
name: Graceful Leaper
